name: reserve-a-seat-for-the-talks-and-attend-a-workshop--stevenson-avery;issue-jira-6-browser-chrome-context-chrome-feature-02-register-registrationto-the-conference-capability-features-02-register-theme-features
title: Reserve a seat for the talks and attend a workshop (Stevenson Avery)

testSteps.description: Given that Stevenson Avery gets access to the ticket reservation page

children.description: Stevenson Avery visits the conference page
Stevenson Avery opens the browser at "/"
Stevenson Avery maximises the browser window
Stevenson Avery wants to register
Stevenson Avery clicks on the Register button

testSteps.description: When he buys a quantity of 4 early tickets for the talks

children.description: Stevenson Avery buys a quantity of 4 early tickets for the talks
Stevenson Avery buys a quantity of 4 tickets of type early
Stevenson Avery clicks on the Talks tab
Stevenson Avery enters 4 into the Number of Early Tickets field

testSteps.description: And he buys a quantity of 5 tickets for the workshop Workshop B

children.description: Stevenson Avery buys a quantity of 5 for the workshop Workshop B
Stevenson Avery buys a quantity of 5 tickets of type Workshop B
Stevenson Avery clicks on the Workshops tab
Stevenson Avery enters 5 into the Number of Workshop B Tickets field

testSteps.description: And he fills the registration form with his personal info: Stevenson Avery, jeanYoung, jeanyoung@nixelt.com, 05/10/1978, ISONUS, 878 Otsego Street - Cassel - Kentucky - 5333, Waterloo, 40649, Germany

children.description: Stevenson Avery fills the registration form with his Stevenson Avery, jeanYoung, jeanyoung@nixelt.com, 05/10/1978, ISONUS, 878 Otsego Street - Cassel - Kentucky - 5333, Waterloo, 40649, Germany
Stevenson Avery scrolls to the Continue button of the tickets section
Stevenson Avery clicks on the Continue button of the tickets section
Stevenson Avery enters Stevenson Avery into the Actor's Fullname
Stevenson Avery enters jeanYoung into the Actor's Nickname
Stevenson Avery enters jeanyoung@nixelt.com into the Actor's Email
Stevenson Avery picks the date 5/10/1978 on the Actor's Date of Birth
Stevenson Avery enters ISONUS into the Actor's Company
Stevenson Avery enters 878 Otsego Street - Cassel - Kentucky - 5333 into the Actor's Address
Stevenson Avery enters Waterloo into the Actor's City
Stevenson Avery enters 40649 into the Actor's Zip
Stevenson Avery selects "Germany" from the Actor's Country
Stevenson Avery clicks on the Continue button of the registration form

testSteps.description: Then he sees the message 'Thank you to have been registered to the AT conference'

children.description: Stevenson Avery checks the text of the Thanking message for the registration
